name: Fatima Ali
bio: As an Arabian chef, I have spent years perfecting my craft and developing my skills in the kitchen. Growing up in a family that valued food and cooking, I learned the importance of using fresh ingredients and incorporating traditional flavors and spices into my dishes.

recipes.name: Lamb Machboos
recipes.method: 1. Cook the lamb with onions and spices. 2. Add tomatoes and simmer. 3. Add rice and cook until done.

recipes.name: Falafel
recipes.method: 1. Blend chickpeas, onion, and spices. 2. Shape into balls. 3. Fry until crispy.

name: Hassan Mohammed
bio: As an Arabian chef, I have spent years perfecting my craft and developing my skills in the kitchen. Growing up in a family that valued food and cooking, I learned the importance of using fresh ingredients and incorporating traditional flavors and spices into my dishes.

recipes.name: Kabsa
recipes.method: 1. Cook the chicken with onions and spices. 2. Add tomatoes and simmer. 3. Add rice and cook until done.

recipes.name: Hummus
recipes.ingredients: Chickpeas, Tahini, Lemon Juice, Garlic, Olive Oil
recipes.method: 1. Blend chickpeas, tahini, lemon juice, and garlic. 2. Drizzle with olive oil.

recipes.name: Tabbouleh
recipes.ingredients: Bulgur, Tomatoes, Parsley, Mint, Lemon Juice
recipes.method: 1. Soak bulgur in water. 2. Mix with chopped tomatoes, parsley, and mint. 3. Dress with lemon juice.

name: Rania Ahmed
bio: As an Arabian chef, I have spent years perfecting my craft and developing my skills in the kitchen. Growing up in a family that valued food and cooking, I learned the importance of using fresh ingredients and incorporating traditional flavors and spices into my dishes.

recipes.name: Kofta
recipes.method: 1. Mix ground beef with onion and spices. 2. Shape into balls. 3. Grill until cooked.

recipes.name: Ful Medames
recipes.ingredients: Fava Beans, Garlic, Lemon Juice, Olive Oil
recipes.method: 1. Cook fava beans with garlic. 2. Mash and season with lemon juice and olive oil.

name: Ahmed Khalid
bio: As an Arabian chef, I have spent years perfecting my craft and developing my skills in the kitchen. Growing up in a family that valued food and cooking, I learned the importance of using fresh ingredients and incorporating traditional flavors and spices into my dishes.

recipes.name: Mansaf
recipes.ingredients: Lamb, Yogurt, Rice, Pine Nuts, Spices
recipes.method: 1. Cook lamb with spices. 2. Simmer in yogurt sauce. 3. Serve over rice and top with pine nuts.

recipes.name: Kanafeh
recipes.ingredients: Kataifi Dough, Cheese, Sugar Syrup, Butter
recipes.method: 1. Spread kataifi dough in a pan. 2. Top with cheese. 3. Bake until golden. 4. Drizzle with sugar syrup and butter.

recipes.name: Baba Ghanoush
recipes.ingredients: Eggplant, Tahini, Lemon Juice, Garlic, Olive Oil
recipes.method: 1. Roast eggplant until soft. 2. Mash with tahini, lemon juice, and garlic. 3. Drizzle with olive oil.

recipes.name: Harees
recipes.method: 1. Cook wheat with meat and spices. 2. Mash until smooth. 3. Serve topped with fried onions.

name: Rasha Hassan
bio: As an Arabian chef, I have spent years perfecting my craft and developing my skills in the kitchen. Growing up in a family that valued food and cooking, I learned the importance of using fresh ingredients and incorporating traditional flavors and spices into my dishes.

recipes.name: Kibbeh
recipes.method: 1. Mix bulgur with ground beef, onion, and spices. 2. Shape into balls or patties. 3. Fry until crispy.

recipes.name: Mujadara
recipes.method: 1. Cook lentils with spices. 2. Mix with rice. 3. Top with fried onions.

recipes.name: Shawarma
recipes.ingredients: Chicken, Pita Bread, Tomatoes, Onions, Tahini Sauce
recipes.method: 1. Marinate chicken in spices. 2. Grill and slice. 3. Serve in pita bread with tomatoes, onions, and tahini sauce.

recipes.name: Fattoush
recipes.method: 1. Cook lentils with spices. 2. Mix with rice. 3. Top with fried onions.

name: Samiya Ali
bio: As an Arabian chef, I have spent years perfecting my craft and developing my skills in the kitchen. Growing up in a family that valued food and cooking, I learned the importance of using fresh ingredients and incorporating traditional flavors and spices into my dishes.

recipes.name: Koshari
recipes.ingredients: Rice, Lentils, Pasta, Tomato Sauce, Caramelized Onions, Chickpeas
recipes.method: 1. Cook rice, lentils, and pasta. 2. Mix with tomato sauce. 3. Top with caramelized onions and chickpeas.

recipes.name: Ful Medames
recipes.ingredients: Fava Beans, Garlic, Lemon Juice, Olive Oil, Parsley
recipes.method: 1. Cook fava beans with garlic. 2. Mash with lemon juice and olive oil. 3. Top with parsley.

recipes.name: Mahshi
recipes.ingredients: Zucchini, Eggplant, Bell Peppers, Rice, Tomato Sauce, Spices
recipes.method: 1. Stuff vegetables with spiced rice. 2. Cook in tomato sauce. 3. Serve hot.

recipes.name: Feseekh
recipes.method: 1. Soak salted fish in water. 2. Serve with flatbread.

name: Salma Ibrahim
bio: As an Arabian chef, I have spent years perfecting my craft and developing my skills in the kitchen. Growing up in a family that valued food and cooking, I learned the importance of using fresh ingredients and incorporating traditional flavors and spices into my dishes.

recipes.name: Kabsa
recipes.method: 1. Cook chicken with spices. 2. Serve over rice with tomatoes and onions.

recipes.name: Mandi
recipes.method: 1. Cook lamb with spices. 2. Serve over rice.

recipes.name: Mutabbaq
recipes.method: 1. Mix flour and egg to make dough. 2. Fill with ground beef, onion, and spices. 3. Fry until golden.

recipes.name: Hininy
recipes.method: 1. Mix milk, sugar, and cornstarch. 2. Add saffron. 3. Cook until thickened.

name: Ahmed Hassan
bio: As an Arabian chef, I have spent years perfecting my craft and developing my skills in the kitchen. Growing up in a family that valued food and cooking, I learned the importance of using fresh ingredients and incorporating traditional flavors and spices into my dishes.

recipes.name: Mansaf
recipes.method: 1. Cook lamb with jameed. 2. Serve over rice. 3. Top with almonds.

recipes.name: Fatayer
recipes.method: 1. Mix flour and yogurt to make dough. 2. Fill with spinach, onion, and sumac. 3. Bake until golden.

recipes.name: Maqluba
recipes.method: 1. Cook chicken with spices. 2. Layer with eggplant and cauliflower. 3. Cook rice separately. 4. Flip upside down to serve.

name: Sanaa Ali
bio: As an Arabian chef, I have spent years perfecting my craft and developing my skills in the kitchen. Growing up in a family that valued food and cooking, I learned the importance of using fresh ingredients and incorporating traditional flavors and spices into my dishes.

recipes.name: Dolma
recipes.ingredients: Grape Leaves, Rice, Ground Beef, Onion,Tomato Sauce, Spices
recipes.method: 1. Stuff grape leaves with spiced rice and ground beef. 2. Cook in tomato sauce. 3. Serve hot.

recipes.name: Tashreeb
recipes.method: 1. Layer bread, lamb, and chickpeas in a dish. 2. Pour yogurt on top. 3. Bake until bubbly.

recipes.name: Sambusak
recipes.method: 1. Mix flour and water to make dough. 2. Fill with ground beef and onion. 3. Fry until golden.

recipes.name: Biryani
recipes.method: 1. Cook chicken with spices. 2. Layer with rice and onions. 3. Bake until cooked through.
